blogPost.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
blogPost.body: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
blogPost.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 开发人员一直在使用Grouparoo用户界面来设置从他们的数据库到Mailchimp等云端工具的自动数据移动。Grouparoo现在支持声明式代码来设置这个管道，所以你可以像管理其他应用一样管理数据同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代码配置与营销工具集成

localize.description: 開發人員一直在使用Grouparoo用戶界面來設置從他們的數據庫到Mailchimp等雲端工具的自動數據移動。Grouparoo現在支持聲明式代碼來設置這個管道，所以你可以像管理其他應用一樣管理數據同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代碼配置與營銷工具集成

previous.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
previous.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free

localize.description: 你知道渐变是多么时髦，但给它们添加轻微的噪点滤镜或颗粒更时髦？好了，现在你不用打开photoshop就能用自己的颜色得到这种效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免费生成您自己的时尚纹理。

localize.description: 你知道漸變是多麼時髦，但給它們添加輕微的噪點濾鏡或顆粒更時髦？好了，現在你不用打開photoshop就能用自己的顏色得到這種效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免費生成您自己的時尚紋理。

next.excerpt: Bankiom is kind of Expedia for your money Track all your money Send money like texting Grow your wealth like a pro in a fun way Your mission if you choose to accept it is to catch our bugs & provide your feedback Let’s change the world one account at a time!
next.title: Bankiom - Smart online banking app to connect your money to your dream

localize.description: Bankiom是一种为你的钱而设的Expedia 追踪你所有的钱 像发短信一样发钱 以一种有趣的方式像专业人员一样增长你的财富 如果你选择接受它，你的任务是抓住我们的错误和提供你的反馈 让我们一次改变一个账户的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能网银应用，让你的钱和梦想连接起来。

localize.description: Bankiom是一種爲你的錢而設的Expedia 追蹤你所有的錢 像發短信一樣發錢 以一種有趣的方式像專業人員一樣增長你的財富 如果你選擇接受它，你的任務是抓住我們的錯誤和提供你的反饋 讓我們一次改變一個賬戶的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能網銀應用，讓你的錢和夢想連接起來。
